results.title: Rust and Bone
results.creator_credit: Virginie Montel, Jacques Audiard, Pascal Caucheteux, Martine Cassinelli, Why Not Productions, Les Films du Fleuve, France 2 Cinéma, Page 114, Lumière, Lunanime, Ciné+, Centre du Cinéma et de l'Audiovisuel de la Fédération Wallonie-Bruxelles, VOO, Vlaams Audiovisueel fonds, Région Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur, Département des Alpes-Maritimes, Casa Kafka Pictures Movie Tax Shelter Empowered by Dexia, Canal+, RTBF, France Télévisions, Michel Barthélémy, Thomas Bidegain, Craig Davidson and Alix Raynaud
results.brief_description: Put in charge of his young son, Ali leaves Belgium for Antibes to live with his sister and her husband as a family. Ali’s bond with Stephanie, a killer whale trainer, grows deeper after Stephanie suffers a horrible accident.

constellations_other.name: Welcome to Chechnya: tales through time
constellations_other.description: Documentary Welcome to Chechnya used ground-breaking deep fake technology to hide the identities of LGBTQ+ people fleeing a government-orchestrated genocide in Chechnya.

results.title: Promising Young Woman
results.creator_credit: Nancy Steiner, Emerald Fennell, Tom Ackerley, Josey McNamara, Ashley Fox, LuckyChap Entertainment, FilmNation Entertainment, Margot Robbie, Ben Browning, Michael Perry, Emily Freund and Jeremy Cox
results.brief_description: A young woman haunted by a tragedy in her past takes revenge on the predatory men unlucky enough to cross her path.

constellations_other.name: Welcome to Chechnya: tales through time
constellations_other.description: Documentary Welcome to Chechnya used ground-breaking deep fake technology to hide the identities of LGBTQ+ people fleeing a government-orchestrated genocide in Chechnya.

results.title: Lost in Translation
results.creator_credit: K.K. Barrett, Anne Ross, Nancy Steiner, American Zoetrope, Focus Features, Tohokushinsha Film Corporation, Elemental Films, Francis Ford Coppola, Sofia Coppola and Ross Katz
results.headline_credit: Japan and United States of America, 2003
results.brief_description: Two lost souls visiting Tokyo — the young, neglected wife of a photographer and a washed-up movie star shooting a TV commercial — find an odd solace and pensive freedom to be real in each other’s company, away from their lives in America.

constellations_other.name: Wong Kar-Wai's Hollywood fingerprints
constellations_other.description: Wong Kar-wai’s modern masterpiece In The Mood For Love is a rich, romantic melodrama that follows the entangled lives of two neighbours (Tony Leung and Maggie Cheung) who develop feelings for each other after learning their spouses are having an affair.

results.creator_credit_for_label: K.K. Barrett, Anne Ross, Nancy Steiner, American Zoetrope, Focus Features, Tohokushinsha Film Corporation, Elemental Films, Francis Ford Coppola, Sofia Coppola and Ross Katz

results.title: Hamilton
results.creator_credit: Thomas Kail, David Korins, Paul Tazewell, Walt Disney Pictures, The Public Theatre, RadicalMedia, Jeffrey Seller and Lin-Manuel Miranda
results.brief_description: Presenting the tale of American founding father Alexander Hamilton, this filmed version of the original Broadway smash hit is the story of America then, told by America now.

constellations_other.name: Assassins: real world manifestations
constellations_other.description: Ryan White’s documentary Assassins breaks down the wild true story of the assassination of North Korea’s Kim John-nam, diving into the political and personal motivations behind the event.

results.title: Disclosure
results.creator_credit: Sofia Midon, Amy Scholder, Avram Finklestein, Bow + Arrow Entertainment, Field of Vision, Disclosure Film and Sam Feder
results.brief_description: An investigation of how Hollywood’s fabled stories have deeply influenced how Americans feel about transgender people, and how transgender people have been taught to feel about themselves.

constellations_other.name: Welcome to Chechnya: tales through time
constellations_other.description: Documentary Welcome to Chechnya used ground-breaking deep fake technology to hide the identities of LGBTQ+ people fleeing a government-orchestrated genocide in Chechnya.

results.title: Catfish
results.creator_credit: Hit the Ground Running Films, Supermarché, Andrew Jarecki, Marc Smerling, Henry Joost and Ariel Schulman
results.brief_description: Nev, a 24-year-old New York-based photographer, has no idea what he’s in for when Abby, an eight-year-old girl from rural Michigan, contacts him on Facebook, seeking permission to paint one of his photographs. When he receives her remarkable painting, Nev begins a friendship and correspondence with Abby’s family. But things really get interesting when he develops a cyber-romance with Abby’s attractive older sister, Megan, a musician and model. Prompted by some startling revelations about Megan, Nev and his buddies embark on a road trip in search of the truth.

constellations_other.name: Assassins: real world manifestations
constellations_other.description: Ryan White’s documentary Assassins breaks down the wild true story of the assassination of North Korea’s Kim John-nam, diving into the political and personal motivations behind the event.

results.title: O.J.: Made in America
results.creator_credit: Ezra Edelman, Connor Schell, Nina Krstic, Deirdre Fenton, Libby Geist, Laylow Films, ESPN Films and Caroline Waterlow
results.brief_description: A chronicle of the rise and fall of O.J. Simpson, whose high-profile murder trial exposed the extent of American racial tensions, revealing a fractured and divided nation.

constellations_other.name: MLK/FBI: blackness In America
constellations_other.description: Award-winning documentarian Sam Pollard looks at J. Edgar Hoover and the FBI’s pursuit of Martin Luther King Jr in the lead-up to his assassination during America’s Civil Rights Movement of the sixties.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Ezra Edelman, Connor Schell, Nina Krstic, Deirdre Fenton, Libby Geist, Laylow Films, ESPN Films and Caroline Waterlow

results.title: MLK/FBI
results.creator_credit: Field of Vision, IFC Films, Sam Pollard, Kate Hurwitz, Benjamin Hedin, Laura Tomaselli, Brian Becker, Sheila Griffin and Dedalus Wainwright
results.brief_description: Based on newly declassified files, the film explores the US government’s surveillance and harassment of Martin Luther King, Jr.

constellations_primary.name: MLK/FBI: blackness In America
constellations_primary.description: Award-winning documentarian Sam Pollard looks at J. Edgar Hoover and the FBI’s pursuit of Martin Luther King Jr in the lead-up to his assassination during America’s Civil Rights Movement of the sixties.

results.title: Ted Bundy: Falling for a Killer
results.creator_credit: Trish Wood, Michael Kot, Betty Orr, Amazon Studios and Saloon Media
results.brief_description: After years of silence, Ted Bundy’s long-term girlfriend Elizabeth Kendall, her daughter Molly, and other survivors come forward for the first time in a docuseries that reframes Bundy’s crimes from a female perspective. The series reveals how Bundy’s pathological hatred of women collided with the culture wars and the feminist movement of the 1970s in one of the most infamous crime stories of our time.

constellations_other.name: Assassins: real world manifestations
constellations_other.description: Ryan White’s documentary Assassins breaks down the wild true story of the assassination of North Korea’s Kim John-nam, diving into the political and personal motivations behind the event.

results.title: Visible: Out On Television
results.creator_credit: Apple Video Programming, LLC, Permut Presentations, Push It Productions, Tripod Media, David Permut and David Bender
results.brief_description: Explore the history of the LGBTQ movement through the lens of TV in this five-part docuseries. Combining archival footage with new interviews, it looks at homophobia, invisibility, the evolution of LGBTQ characters, and coming out in the TV industry.

constellations_other.name: Assassins: real world manifestations
constellations_other.description: Ryan White’s documentary Assassins breaks down the wild true story of the assassination of North Korea’s Kim John-nam, diving into the political and personal motivations behind the event.
